title: JetBrains Academy – March Digest
description: April is always a busy month in tech. For example, in April 1986, IBM became the first to use a megabit chip. In 1991, Java development began in earnest. And, of course, there’s April Fools’ Day – perfect for programming jokes and clever pranks. This April is certainly no exception! Check out fresh courses, events, […]
author: Maria Sharobaeva
excerpt: A new JavaScript course, a boot camp, a young programmers’ camp in Romania, a Google event, and a Munich meetup!
text: The place for learning and teaching computer science your way Digest JetBrains AcademyJetBrains Academy – March Digest April is always a busy month in tech. For example, in April 1986, IBM became the first to use a megabit chip. In 1991, Java development began in earnest. And, of course, there’s April Fools’ Day – perfect for programming jokes and clever pranks. This April is certainly no exception! Check out fresh courses, events, and opportunities to help you grow Hands-on learning New Introduction to JavaScript Curious about web dev? Learn the JavaScript basics in just 15–20 hours in our free in-IDE course. Explore course Full-Stack Web Developer Boot Camp Master full-stack development in 10 months. Build real web apps using AI tools, HTML, CSS, JS, React, Python, and FastAPI from interface and backend to shipping working products. Start learning Events for you Google Summer of Code 2025 Looking for a remote internship? Apply to Google Summer of Code by April 8 to work on impactful open-source Kotlin projects with mentorship from engineers at JetBrains, Google, Uber, and more. Apply now The Algorithm and Code Training School Apply by April 27 for the Algorithm and Code Training School in Romania, pass the entrance exam, and get your invitation to the camp where you will train for IT contests, learn from world-class experts, and network with other young programmers like you. Learn more How to Develop Your Career in Tech Join us on April 10 at the JetBrains office in Munich for an inspiring and free women-in-tech meetup. You’ll hear from two amazing speakers on navigating career growth and overcoming challenges in tech. Register now Subscribe to JetBrains Academy news IT courses, career insights, upcoming events and more Discover more
html:
The place for learning and teaching computer science your way

Digest JetBrains Academy

JetBrains Academy – March Digest

April is always a busy month in tech. For example, in April 1986, IBM became the first to use a megabit chip. In 1991, Java development began in earnest. And, of course, there’s April Fools’ Day – perfect for programming jokes and clever pranks.

This April is certainly no exception! Check out fresh courses, events, and opportunities to help you grow

Hands-on learning

New Introduction to JavaScript

Curious about web dev? Learn the JavaScript basics in just 15–20 hours in our free in-IDE course.

Explore course

Full-Stack Web Developer Boot Camp

Master full-stack development in 10 months. Build real web apps using AI tools, HTML, CSS, JS, React, Python, and FastAPI from interface and backend to shipping working products.

Start learning

Events for you

Google Summer of Code 2025

Looking for a remote internship? Apply to Google Summer of Code by April 8 to work on impactful open-source Kotlin projects with mentorship from engineers at JetBrains, Google, Uber, and more.

Apply now

The Algorithm and Code Training School

Apply by April 27 for the Algorithm and Code Training School in Romania, pass the entrance exam, and get your invitation to the camp where you will train for IT contests, learn from world-class experts, and network with other young programmers like you.

Learn more

How to Develop Your Career in Tech

Join us on April 10 at the JetBrains office in Munich for an inspiring and free women-in-tech meetup. You’ll hear from two amazing speakers on navigating career growth and overcoming challenges in tech.

Register now

Subscribe to JetBrains Academy news

IT courses, career insights, upcoming events and more

Discover more
